about_the_game:
In a ruined world, overrun by evil robots, a disabled cyborg named Blaze rests. Send a spark of energy from your world to Blaze’s to wake him up.

Help Blaze take revenge against the robots in this fast paced 2D platformer where you workout to level up. The Fittest Fire game features:

Powerful melee attacks that devastate enemies and recharge your ammo


Fast ranged attacks to dispatch enemies from a distance


Tight movement controls with variable jumping, dashing, and wall jumping


An explorable world with 12 unique areas, 8 bosses, and 20+ enemy types


Fittest Fire comes with a mobile app


Fittest Fire is both a game and mobile app. The Fittest Fire mobile app allows you to log exercises and get points based on the weight, reps, time, and/or distance. These points can be used in the Fittest Fire game to:

  • Increase sword and gun damage as well as the attack speed
  • Unlock powerful special attacks for both the sword and gun
  • Increase health points, movement speed, and power up durations

Power up with Fire mode once it’s unlocked




It's possible to play the game without downloading the mobile app. However, you will not be able to level up without the mobile app and will face significantly more difficult gameplay.

ext_user_account_notice: Players will need to create a Fittest Fire account in order to level up in the game. Players will create their accounts during the Fittest Fire mobile app onboarding process. The game includes links to the Google Play store so players can easily find the Fittest Fire mobile app.
